mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barter Theatre 50th Anniversary, Season 1982 poster
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for Love's Labour's Lost by William Shakespeare| You Can't Take It with You by George S. Kaufman and Moss Hart| Hedda Gabler by Henrik Ibsen| The Matchmaker by Thornton Wilder| Tintypes, conceived by Mary Kyte with Mel Marvin and Gary Pearle| I Ought to Be in Pictures by Neil Simon| The Moustrap by Agatha Christie.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Abingdon, Washington county, Virginia, United States

This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes.
